name: Beetle Revenge
description:
Beetle Revenge is a top down shooter with no movement. You need to navigate the levels using the recoil from the various guns you're equipped with. While doing that, you need to either avoid or compenstate for the enemies shooting at you. While you can't die from the bullets, they have a knockback effect. Pretty much all the walls are decorated with spikes which are the only way to get killed in the game, so watch out to not get impaled!

Controls:
LMB - shoot
Scroll wheel - switch weapons
ESC - pause
alt +f4 - exit :P

Made for GMTK Jam in 48 hours.

PS Doesn't this page look awesome? I know it does :P I had a little too much fun designing the page ;)
